title: Drawing, "Design for and Ark Curtain, Park Synagogue, Cleveland Heights, Ohio", ca. 1960
medium: Cut paper, gouache, silver paint on gold-patterned Chinese paper.
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Vertical design of repeating yellow, gold, silver, and beige Hebrew letter "Shin" with single red "Shin" at upper left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for and Ark Curtain, Park Synagogue, Cleveland Heights, Ohio", ca. 1960.
ca. 1960. Cut paper, gouache, silver paint on gold-patterned Chinese paper.. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-67.
